**Cursor**

ì¢‹ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤! ë°±ì—”ë“œ APIê°€ ì˜ êµ¬í˜„ë˜ì–´ ìˆê³  ë°ì´í„°ë„ ìˆë„¤ìš”. ì´ì œ í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ì—”ë“œì—ì„œ ì‹œê°í™”ë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•´ë³´ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

## êµ¬í˜„ ìˆœì„œ ì œì•ˆ

### 1ë‹¨ê³„: ê¸°ë³¸ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒ ë° API ì—°ë™
- ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ ê¸°ë³¸ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒ (ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ)
- API í˜¸ì¶œì„ ìœ„í•œ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ í•¨ìˆ˜ë“¤
- ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ë§

### 2ë‹¨ê³„: íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ (Line Chart)
- ì‹œê°„ëŒ€ë³„ ìš”ì²­ëŸ‰ ì¶”ì´ ê·¸ë˜í”„
- Recharts LineChart ì‚¬ìš©

### 3ë‹¨ê³„: ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© (Bar Chart)
- APIë³„ í˜¸ì¶œ íšŸìˆ˜ ë° í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„
- Recharts BarChart ì‚¬ìš©

### 4ë‹¨ê³„: ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ (Pie Chart)
- ì„±ê³µ/ì—ëŸ¬ ë¹„ìœ¨ ì‹œê°í™”

### 5ë‹¨ê³„: ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ (Table + Chart)
- ëŠë¦° ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸
- P90 ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„ ì°¨íŠ¸

## ì‹œì‘í•´ë³´ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!

ë¨¼ì € 1ë‹¨ê³„ë¶€í„° ì‹œì‘í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê¸°ë³¸ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒê³¼ API ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ë³´ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescript
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = 'http://localhost:8000';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

export interface TrafficData {
  timestamp: string;
  count: number;
}

export interface UsageData {
  path: string;
  count: number;
  avg_ms: number;
}

export interface ErrorData {
  [key: string]: number; // e.g., "200xx": 247, "404xx": 27, "500xx": 36
}

export interface BottleneckData {
  path: string;
  avg_ms: number;
  p90_ms: number;
}

export interface AnomalyData {
  path: string;
  status: number;
  count: number;
}

export const dashboardApi = {
  // íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„
  getTraffic: async (start: string, end: string, interval: number = 5): Promise<TrafficData[]> => {
    const response = await api.get('/api/stats/traffic', {
      params: { start, end, interval }
    });
    return response.data;
  },

  // ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™©
  getUsage: async (start: string, end: string): Promise<UsageData[]> => {
    const response = await api.get('/api/stats/usage', {
      params: { start, end }
    });
    return response.data;
  },

  // ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬
  getErrors: async (start: string, end: string): Promise<ErrorData> => {
    const response = await api.get('/api/stats/errors', {
      params: { start, end }
    });
    return response.data;
  },

  // ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„
  getBottlenecks: async (start: string, end: string, topN: number = 5): Promise<BottleneckData[]> => {
    const response = await api.get('/api/stats/bottlenecks', {
      params: { start, end, top_n: topN }
    });
    return response.data;
  },

  // ì´ìƒ ìš”ì²­ íƒì§€
  getAnomalies: async (start: string, end: string, threshold: number = 100): Promise<AnomalyData[]> => {
    const response = await api.get('/api/stats/anomalies', {
      params: { start, end, threshold }
    });
    return response.data;
  },
};
```

```typescriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { dashboardApi, TrafficData, UsageData, ErrorData, BottleneckData } from '../services/api';
import './Dashboard.css';

const Dashboard: React.FC = () => {
  const [trafficData, setTrafficData] = useState<TrafficData[]>([]);
  const [usageData, setUsageData] = useState<UsageData[]>([]);
  const [errorData, setErrorData] = useState<ErrorData>({});
  const [bottleneckData, setBottleneckData] = useState<BottleneckData[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);

  // ê¸°ë³¸ ë‚ ì§œ ë²”ìœ„ (ìµœê·¼ 3ì¼)
  const getDefaultDateRange = () => {
    const end = new Date();
    const start = new Date();
    start.setDate(start.getDate() - 3);
    return {
      start: start.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T00:00:00',
      end: end.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T23:59:59'
    };
  };

  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState(getDefaultDateRange());

  const fetchDashboardData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setError(null);

      const { start, end } = dateRange;

      const [traffic, usage, errors, bottlenecks] = await Promise.all([
        dashboardApi.getTraffic(start, end, 5),
        dashboardApi.getUsage(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getErrors(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getBottlenecks(start, end, 5)
      ]);

      setTrafficData(traffic);
      setUsageData(usage);
      setErrorData(errors);
      setBottleneckData(bottlenecks);
    } catch (err) {
      setError('ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
      console.error('Dashboard data fetch error:', err);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchDashboardData();
  }, [dateRange]);

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="loading">ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="error">{error}</div>
        <button onClick={fetchDashboardData}>ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‹œë„</button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="dashboard">
      <header className="dashboard-header">
        <h1>ë¡œê·¸ ë¶„ì„ ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ</h1>
        <div className="date-range">
          <label>
            ì‹œì‘ì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.start}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, start: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
          <label>
            ì¢…ë£Œì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.end}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, end: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
        </div>
      </header>

      <div className="dashboard-grid">
        {/* íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <TrafficChart data={trafficData} />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™©</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <UsageChart data={usageData} />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <ErrorChart data={errorData} />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <BottleneckChart data={bottleneckData} />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

// ì„ì‹œ ì°¨íŠ¸ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë“¤ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)
const TrafficChart: React.FC<{ data: TrafficData[] }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

const UsageChart: React.FC<{ data: UsageData[] }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

const ErrorChart: React.FC<{ data: ErrorData }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ì—ëŸ¬ ë¶„í¬ ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

const BottleneckChart: React.FC<{ data: BottleneckData[] }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ë³‘ëª© ë¶„ì„ ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

export default Dashboard;
```

```typescriptreact
import React from 'react';
```

ë°±ì—”ë“œì— CORS ì„¤ì •ì´ ì—†ì–´ì„œ í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ì—”ë“œì—ì„œ API í˜¸ì¶œì´ ì•ˆ ë˜ëŠ” ê²ƒ ê°™ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë°±ì—”ë“œì— CORS ì„¤ì •ì„ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```python
from fastapi import FastAPI
from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware
from routers.ingest import router as ingest_router
from routers.dashboard import router as stats_router
from database import init_db
import logging

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)
app = FastAPI()

# CORS ì„¤ì • ì¶”ê°€
app.add_middleware(
    CORSMiddleware,
    allow_origins=["http://localhost:3000", "http://localhost:3001"],  # React ê°œë°œ ì„œë²„
    allow_credentials=True,
    allow_methods=["*"],
    allow_headers=["*"],
)

@app.on_event("startup")
async def startup_event():
    await init_db()
    logging.info("âœ… Database initialized successfully.")

# ë¡œê·¸ ìˆ˜ì§‘ (/log/ingest) â€” ingest_router ì— ì´ë¯¸ prefix="/log" ìˆìŒ
app.include_router(ingest_router)

# í†µê³„/ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ (/api/â€¦)
app.include_router(stats_router, prefix="/api")
```

í˜¹ì‹œ ì—¬ì „íˆ ë¬¸ì œê°€ ìˆë‹¤ë©´ ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì˜ ê°œë°œì ë„êµ¬(F12)ì—ì„œ Network íƒ­ì„ í™•ì¸í•´ì„œ ì–´ë–¤ ì—ëŸ¬ê°€ ë°œìƒí•˜ëŠ”ì§€ ì•Œë ¤ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!

ì•„, ì´ë¯¸ Docker Composeë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰ ì¤‘ì´ì‹œêµ°ìš”! ê·¸ëŸ¼ CORS ì„¤ì •ë§Œ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ë©´ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤. 

í˜„ì¬ ë°±ì—”ë“œ ì½”ë“œì— CORS ì„¤ì •ì„ ì¶”ê°€í–ˆìœ¼ë‹ˆ, Docker ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆë¥¼ ì¬ì‹œì‘í•´ì•¼ ë³€ê²½ì‚¬í•­ì´ ì ìš©ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ë‹¤ìŒ ëª…ë ¹ì–´ë¡œ ë°±ì—”ë“œ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆë§Œ ì¬ì‹œì‘í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”:

ì´ë ‡ê²Œ í•˜ë©´ CORS ì„¤ì •ì´ ì ìš©ë˜ì–´ í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ì—”ë“œì—ì„œ API í˜¸ì¶œì´ ê°€ëŠ¥í•´ì§‘ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ì¬ì‹œì‘ í›„ ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ `http://localhost:3000`ì— ì ‘ì†í•˜ì‹œë©´ ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì •ìƒì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¡œë“œë  ê²ƒì…ë‹ˆë‹¤!

**User**

ì¢‹ì•„ ì˜ëœ¨ë„¤ ì ë‹¤ìŒë‹¨ê³„ê°€ ë­ì˜€ì§€?

---

**Cursor**

ì¢‹ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤! ì´ì œ **2ë‹¨ê³„: íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ (Line Chart)**ë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

í˜„ì¬ ì„ì‹œë¡œ JSON ë°ì´í„°ë§Œ ë³´ì—¬ì£¼ê³  ìˆëŠ”ë°, ì´ì œ ì‹¤ì œ ì°¨íŠ¸ë¡œ ì‹œê°í™”í•´ë³´ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React from 'react';
import {
  LineChart,
  Line,
  XAxis,
  YAxis,
  CartesianGrid,
  Tooltip,
  ResponsiveContainer,
  Legend
} from 'recharts';
import { TrafficData } from '../services/api';

interface TrafficChartProps {
  data: TrafficData[];
}

const TrafficChart: React.FC<TrafficChartProps> = ({ data }) => {
  // ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ë¡œë”© ë©”ì‹œì§€ í‘œì‹œ
  if (!data || data.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="chart-container">
        <div className="no-data">íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // ì‹œê°„ í¬ë§·íŒ… í•¨ìˆ˜
  const formatTime = (timestamp: string) => {
    const date = new Date(timestamp);
    return date.toLocaleString('ko-KR', {
      month: 'short',
      day: 'numeric',
      hour: '2-digit',
      minute: '2-digit'
    });
  };

  // ì°¨íŠ¸ ë°ì´í„° í¬ë§·íŒ…
  const chartData = data.map(item => ({
    ...item,
    time: formatTime(item.timestamp),
    requests: item.count
  }));

  return (
    <div className="chart-container">
      <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
        <LineChart data={chartData} margin={{ top: 5, right: 30, left: 20, bottom: 5 }}>
          <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
          <XAxis 
            dataKey="time" 
            angle={-45}
            textAnchor="end"
            height={80}
            interval={0}
            tick={{ fontSize: 12 }}
          />
          <YAxis 
            label={{ value: 'ìš”ì²­ ìˆ˜', angle: -90, position: 'insideLeft' }}
            tick={{ fontSize: 12 }}
          />
          <Tooltip 
            formatter={(value: number) => [`${value}ê±´`, 'ìš”ì²­ ìˆ˜']}
            labelFormatter={(label) => `ì‹œê°„: ${label}`}
          />
          <Legend />
          <Line 
            type="monotone" 
            dataKey="requests" 
            stroke="#8884d8" 
            strokeWidth={2}
            dot={{ fill: '#8884d8', strokeWidth: 2, r: 4 }}
            activeDot={{ r: 6 }}
            name="ìš”ì²­ ìˆ˜"
          />
        </LineChart>
      </ResponsiveContainer>
      
      {/* ìš”ì•½ í†µê³„ */}
      <div className="chart-summary">
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì´ ìš”ì²­:</span>
          <span className="value">{data.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.count, 0).toLocaleString()}ê±´</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">í‰ê·  ìš”ì²­:</span>
          <span className="value">
            {data.length > 0 ? (data.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.count, 0) / data.length).toFixed(1) : 0}ê±´/ì‹œê°„
          </span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ìµœëŒ€ ìš”ì²­:</span>
          <span className="value">
            {data.length > 0 ? Math.max(...data.map(item => item.count)) : 0}ê±´
          </span>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default TrafficChart;
```

ì´ì œ Dashboard ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì—ì„œ ì„ì‹œ TrafficChartë¥¼ ì‹¤ì œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¡œ êµì²´í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { dashboardApi, TrafficData, UsageData, ErrorData, BottleneckData } from '../services/api';
import TrafficChart from './TrafficChart';
import './Dashboard.css';

const Dashboard: React.FC = () => {
  const [trafficData, setTrafficData] = useState<TrafficData[]>([]);
  const [usageData, setUsageData] = useState<UsageData[]>([]);
  const [errorData, setErrorData] = useState<ErrorData>({});
  const [bottleneckData, setBottleneckData] = useState<BottleneckData[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);

  // ê¸°ë³¸ ë‚ ì§œ ë²”ìœ„ (ìµœê·¼ 3ì¼)
  const getDefaultDateRange = () => {
    const end = new Date();
    const start = new Date();
    start.setDate(start.getDate() - 3);
    return {
      start: start.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T00:00:00',
      end: end.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T23:59:59'
    };
  };

  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState(getDefaultDateRange());

  const fetchDashboardData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setError(null);

      const { start, end } = dateRange;

      const [traffic, usage, errors, bottlenecks] = await Promise.all([
        dashboardApi.getTraffic(start, end, 5),
        dashboardApi.getUsage(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getErrors(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getBottlenecks(start, end, 5)
      ]);

      setTrafficData(traffic);
      setUsageData(usage);
      setErrorData(errors);
      setBottleneckData(bottlenecks);
    } catch (err) {
      setError('ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
      console.error('Dashboard data fetch error:', err);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchDashboardData();
  }, [dateRange]);

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="loading">ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="error">{error}</div>
        <button onClick={fetchDashboardData}>ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‹œë„</button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="dashboard">
      <header className="dashboard-header">
        <h1>ë¡œê·¸ ë¶„ì„ ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ</h1>
        <div className="date-range">
          <label>
            ì‹œì‘ì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.start}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, start: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
          <label>
            ì¢…ë£Œì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.end}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, end: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
        </div>
      </header>

      <div className="dashboard-grid">
        {/* íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„</h2>
          <TrafficChart data={trafficData} />
        </div>

        {/* ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™©</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <UsageChart data={usageData} />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <ErrorChart data={errorData} />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <BottleneckChart data={bottleneckData} />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

// ì„ì‹œ ì°¨íŠ¸ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë“¤ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)
const UsageChart: React.FC<{ data: UsageData[] }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

const ErrorChart: React.FC<{ data: ErrorData }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ì—ëŸ¬ ë¶„í¬ ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

const BottleneckChart: React.FC<{ data: BottleneckData[] }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ë³‘ëª© ë¶„ì„ ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

export default Dashboard;
```

## 2ë‹¨ê³„ ì™„ë£Œ! ï¿½ï¿½

**íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ (Line Chart)**ì´ êµ¬í˜„ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!

### êµ¬í˜„ëœ ê¸°ëŠ¥:
âœ… **ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¼ì¸ ì°¨íŠ¸**: ì‹œê°„ëŒ€ë³„ ìš”ì²­ëŸ‰ ì¶”ì´  
âœ… **í•œêµ­ì–´ ì‹œê°„ í¬ë§·**: ë³´ê¸° ì‰¬ìš´ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ  
âœ… **ì¸í„°ë™í‹°ë¸Œ íˆ´íŒ**: ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ ì˜¤ë²„ì‹œ ìƒì„¸ ì •ë³´  
âœ… **ìš”ì•½ í†µê³„**: ì´ ìš”ì²­, í‰ê·  ìš”ì²­, ìµœëŒ€ ìš”ì²­  
âœ… **ë°˜ì‘í˜• ë””ìì¸**: í™”ë©´ í¬ê¸°ì— ë§ì¶° ì¡°ì •  

ì´ì œ ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ `http://localhost:3000`ì— ì ‘ì†í•˜ì‹œë©´ íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ì°¨íŠ¸ê°€ ì‹¤ì œ ë¼ì¸ ì°¨íŠ¸ë¡œ í‘œì‹œë©ë‹ˆë‹¤!

## ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„:
**3ë‹¨ê³„: ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© (Bar Chart)**ë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í• ê¹Œìš”?

ì´ ì°¨íŠ¸ëŠ” ì–´ë–¤ APIê°€ ê°€ì¥ ë§ì´ í˜¸ì¶œë˜ëŠ”ì§€ì™€ í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„ì„ ë°” ì°¨íŠ¸ë¡œ ë³´ì—¬ì¤„ ì˜ˆì •ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

---

**User**

3ë‹¨ê¼ë¡œ ê°€ì

---

**Cursor**

ì¢‹ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤! **3ë‹¨ê³„: ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© (Bar Chart)**ë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React from 'react';
import {
  BarChart,
  Bar,
  XAxis,
  YAxis,
  CartesianGrid,
  Tooltip,
  ResponsiveContainer,
  Legend,
  ComposedChart,
  Line
} from 'recharts';
import { UsageData } from '../services/api';

interface UsageChartProps {
  data: UsageData[];
}

const UsageChart: React.FC<UsageChartProps> = ({ data }) => {
  // ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ë¡œë”© ë©”ì‹œì§€ í‘œì‹œ
  if (!data || data.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="chart-container">
        <div className="no-data">ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // API ê²½ë¡œë¥¼ ì§§ê²Œ í‘œì‹œí•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜
  const formatPath = (path: string) => {
    if (path.length > 20) {
      return path.substring(0, 20) + '...';
    }
    return path;
  };

  // ì°¨íŠ¸ ë°ì´í„° í¬ë§·íŒ…
  const chartData = data.map(item => ({
    ...item,
    shortPath: formatPath(item.path),
    fullPath: item.path,
    count: item.count,
    avgMs: Math.round(item.avg_ms)
  }));

  return (
    <div className="chart-container">
      <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
        <ComposedChart data={chartData} margin={{ top: 5, right: 30, left: 20, bottom: 80 }}>
          <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
          <XAxis 
            dataKey="shortPath" 
            angle={-45}
            textAnchor="end"
            height={80}
            interval={0}
            tick={{ fontSize: 11 }}
          />
          <YAxis 
            yAxisId="left"
            label={{ value: 'í˜¸ì¶œ íšŸìˆ˜', angle: -90, position: 'insideLeft' }}
            tick={{ fontSize: 12 }}
          />
          <YAxis 
            yAxisId="right"
            orientation="right"
            label={{ value: 'í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„ (ms)', angle: 90, position: 'insideRight' }}
            tick={{ fontSize: 12 }}
          />
          <Tooltip 
            formatter={(value: number, name: string) => {
              if (name === 'count') return [`${value}íšŒ`, 'í˜¸ì¶œ íšŸìˆ˜'];
              if (name === 'avgMs') return [`${value}ms`, 'í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„'];
              return [value, name];
            }}
            labelFormatter={(label, payload) => {
              if (payload && payload[0]) {
                return `API: ${payload[0].payload.fullPath}`;
              }
              return label;
            }}
          />
          <Legend />
          <Bar 
            yAxisId="left"
            dataKey="count" 
            fill="#8884d8" 
            name="í˜¸ì¶œ íšŸìˆ˜"
            radius={[4, 4, 0, 0]}
          />
          <Line 
            yAxisId="right"
            type="monotone" 
            dataKey="avgMs" 
            stroke="#ff7300" 
            strokeWidth={2}
            dot={{ fill: '#ff7300', strokeWidth: 2, r: 4 }}
            activeDot={{ r: 6 }}
            name="í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„"
          />
        </ComposedChart>
      </ResponsiveContainer>
      
      {/* ìš”ì•½ í†µê³„ */}
      <div className="chart-summary">
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì´ API í˜¸ì¶œ:</span>
          <span className="value">{data.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.count, 0).toLocaleString()}íšŒ</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„:</span>
          <span className="value">
            {data.length > 0 ? Math.round(data.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.avg_ms, 0) / data.length) : 0}ms
          </span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ê°€ì¥ ì¸ê¸° API:</span>
          <span className="value">
            {data.length > 0 ? formatPath(data[0].path) : '-'}
          </span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ê°€ì¥ ëŠë¦° API:</span>
          <span className="value">
            {data.length > 0 ? formatPath(data.reduce((max, item) => item.avg_ms > max.avg_ms ? item : max).path) : '-'}
          </span>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default UsageChart;
```

ì´ì œ Dashboard ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì—ì„œ ì„ì‹œ UsageChartë¥¼ ì‹¤ì œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¡œ êµì²´í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { dashboardApi, TrafficData, UsageData, ErrorData, BottleneckData } from '../services/api';
import TrafficChart from './TrafficChart';
import UsageChart from './UsageChart';
import './Dashboard.css';

const Dashboard: React.FC = () => {
  const [trafficData, setTrafficData] = useState<TrafficData[]>([]);
  const [usageData, setUsageData] = useState<UsageData[]>([]);
  const [errorData, setErrorData] = useState<ErrorData>({});
  const [bottleneckData, setBottleneckData] = useState<BottleneckData[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);

  // ê¸°ë³¸ ë‚ ì§œ ë²”ìœ„ (ìµœê·¼ 3ì¼)
  const getDefaultDateRange = () => {
    const end = new Date();
    const start = new Date();
    start.setDate(start.getDate() - 3);
    return {
      start: start.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T00:00:00',
      end: end.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T23:59:59'
    };
  };

  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState(getDefaultDateRange());

  const fetchDashboardData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setError(null);

      const { start, end } = dateRange;

      const [traffic, usage, errors, bottlenecks] = await Promise.all([
        dashboardApi.getTraffic(start, end, 5),
        dashboardApi.getUsage(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getErrors(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getBottlenecks(start, end, 5)
      ]);

      setTrafficData(traffic);
      setUsageData(usage);
      setErrorData(errors);
      setBottleneckData(bottlenecks);
    } catch (err) {
      setError('ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
      console.error('Dashboard data fetch error:', err);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchDashboardData();
  }, [dateRange]);

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="loading">ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="error">{error}</div>
        <button onClick={fetchDashboardData}>ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‹œë„</button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="dashboard">
      <header className="dashboard-header">
        <h1>ë¡œê·¸ ë¶„ì„ ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ</h1>
        <div className="date-range">
          <label>
            ì‹œì‘ì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.start}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, start: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
          <label>
            ì¢…ë£Œì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.end}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, end: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
        </div>
      </header>

      <div className="dashboard-grid">
        {/* íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„</h2>
          <TrafficChart data={trafficData} />
        </div>

        {/* ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™©</h2>
          <UsageChart data={usageData} />
        </div>

        {/* ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <ErrorChart data={errorData} />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <BottleneckChart data={bottleneckData} />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

// ì„ì‹œ ì°¨íŠ¸ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë“¤ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)
const ErrorChart: React.FC<{ data: ErrorData }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ì—ëŸ¬ ë¶„í¬ ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

const BottleneckChart: React.FC<{ data: BottleneckData[] }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ë³‘ëª© ë¶„ì„ ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

export default Dashboard;
```

## 3ë‹¨ê³„ ì™„ë£Œ! ğŸ‰

**ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© (Composed Chart)**ì´ êµ¬í˜„ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!

### êµ¬í˜„ëœ ê¸°ëŠ¥:
âœ… **ë³µí•© ì°¨íŠ¸**: ë°” ì°¨íŠ¸(í˜¸ì¶œ íšŸìˆ˜) + ë¼ì¸ ì°¨íŠ¸(ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„)  
âœ… **ì´ì¤‘ Yì¶•**: ì™¼ìª½(í˜¸ì¶œ íšŸìˆ˜), ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½(ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„)  
âœ… **API ê²½ë¡œ ì¶•ì•½**: ê¸´ ê²½ë¡œëŠ” 20ìë¡œ ì¶•ì•½í•˜ì—¬ í‘œì‹œ  
âœ… **ìƒì„¸ íˆ´íŒ**: ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ ì˜¤ë²„ì‹œ ì „ì²´ API ê²½ë¡œì™€ ìƒì„¸ ì •ë³´  
âœ… **ìš”ì•½ í†µê³„**: ì´ í˜¸ì¶œ, í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„, ê°€ì¥ ì¸ê¸°/ëŠë¦° API  
âœ… **ì¸í„°ë™í‹°ë¸Œ**: ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ ì˜¤ë²„ì‹œ í•˜ì´ë¼ì´íŠ¸  

### ì°¨íŠ¸ íŠ¹ì§•:
- **íŒŒë€ìƒ‰ ë°”**: ê° APIì˜ í˜¸ì¶œ íšŸìˆ˜
- **ì£¼í™©ìƒ‰ ë¼ì¸**: ê° APIì˜ í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„
- **ì´ì¤‘ Yì¶•**: ë‘ ê°€ì§€ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ìŠ¤ì¼€ì¼ì˜ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ í•œ ë²ˆì— ë¹„êµ ê°€ëŠ¥

ì´ì œ ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ í™•ì¸í•˜ì‹œë©´ APIë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™©ì´ ì‹œê°ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì˜ í‘œí˜„ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤!

## ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„:
**4ë‹¨ê³„: ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ (Pie Chart)**ë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í• ê¹Œìš”?

ì´ ì°¨íŠ¸ëŠ” ì„±ê³µ(2xx), í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ì—ëŸ¬(4xx), ì„œë²„ ì—ëŸ¬(5xx)ì˜ ë¹„ìœ¨ì„ íŒŒì´ ì°¨íŠ¸ë¡œ ë³´ì—¬ì¤„ ì˜ˆì •ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

---

**User**

ë‹¤ìŒìœ¼ë¡œê°€ì

---

**Cursor**

ì¢‹ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤! **4ë‹¨ê³„: ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ (Pie Chart)**ë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React from 'react';
import {
  PieChart,
  Pie,
  Cell,
  ResponsiveContainer,
  Tooltip,
  Legend
} from 'recharts';
import { ErrorData } from '../services/api';

interface ErrorChartProps {
  data: ErrorData;
}

const ErrorChart: React.FC<ErrorChartProps> = ({ data }) => {
  // ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ë¡œë”© ë©”ì‹œì§€ í‘œì‹œ
  if (!data || Object.keys(data).length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="chart-container">
        <div className="no-data">ì—ëŸ¬ ë¶„í¬ ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // ì°¨íŠ¸ ë°ì´í„° í¬ë§·íŒ…
  const chartData = Object.entries(data).map(([key, value]) => ({
    name: key,
    value: value,
    color: getStatusColor(key)
  }));

  // ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œë³„ ìƒ‰ìƒ ì •ì˜
  function getStatusColor(status: string): string {
    switch (status) {
      case '200xx':
        return '#52c41a'; // ì„±ê³µ - ì´ˆë¡ìƒ‰
      case '300xx':
        return '#1890ff'; // ë¦¬ë‹¤ì´ë ‰íŠ¸ - íŒŒë€ìƒ‰
      case '400xx':
        return '#faad14'; // í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ì—ëŸ¬ - ì£¼í™©ìƒ‰
      case '500xx':
        return '#f5222d'; // ì„œë²„ ì—ëŸ¬ - ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
      default:
        return '#d9d9d9'; // ê¸°íƒ€ - íšŒìƒ‰
    }
  }

  // ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œë³„ ì„¤ëª…
  function getStatusDescription(status: string): string {
    switch (status) {
      case '200xx':
        return 'ì„±ê³µ (2xx)';
      case '300xx':
        return 'ë¦¬ë‹¤ì´ë ‰íŠ¸ (3xx)';
      case '400xx':
        return 'í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ì—ëŸ¬ (4xx)';
      case '500xx':
        return 'ì„œë²„ ì—ëŸ¬ (5xx)';
      default:
        return status;
    }
  }

  // ì´ ìš”ì²­ ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚°
  const totalRequests = Object.values(data).reduce((sum, count) => sum + count, 0);

  // ì„±ê³µë¥  ê³„ì‚°
  const successRate = data['200xx'] ? ((data['200xx'] / totalRequests) * 100).toFixed(1) : '0.0';

  // ì—ëŸ¬ìœ¨ ê³„ì‚°
  const errorRate = data['400xx'] || data['500xx'] 
    ? (((data['400xx'] || 0) + (data['500xx'] || 0)) / totalRequests * 100).toFixed(1) 
    : '0.0';

  return (
    <div className="chart-container">
      <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
        <PieChart>
          <Pie
            data={chartData}
            cx="50%"
            cy="50%"
            labelLine={false}
            label={({ name, percent }) => `${getStatusDescription(name)} ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%`}
            outerRadius={80}
            fill="#8884d8"
            dataKey="value"
          >
            {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
              <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={entry.color} />
            ))}
          </Pie>
          <Tooltip 
            formatter={(value: number) => [`${value}ê±´`, 'ìš”ì²­ ìˆ˜']}
            labelFormatter={(label) => getStatusDescription(label)}
          />
          <Legend 
            formatter={(value) => getStatusDescription(value)}
            layout="horizontal"
            verticalAlign="bottom"
            align="center"
          />
        </PieChart>
      </ResponsiveContainer>
      
      {/* ìš”ì•½ í†µê³„ */}
      <div className="chart-summary">
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì´ ìš”ì²­:</span>
          <span className="value">{totalRequests.toLocaleString()}ê±´</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì„±ê³µë¥ :</span>
          <span className="value success">{successRate}%</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì—ëŸ¬ìœ¨:</span>
          <span className="value error">{errorRate}%</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ê°€ì¥ ë§ì€ ì—ëŸ¬:</span>
          <span className="value">
            {Object.entries(data)
              .filter(([key]) => key !== '200xx')
              .sort(([,a], [,b]) => b - a)[0]?.[0] || '-'}
          </span>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* ìƒì„¸ í†µê³„ í…Œì´ë¸” */}
      <div className="error-details">
        <h4>ìƒì„¸ í†µê³„</h4>
        <div className="error-table">
          {Object.entries(data).map(([status, count]) => (
            <div key={status} className="error-row">
              <span className="error-status">{getStatusDescription(status)}</span>
              <span className="error-count">{count.toLocaleString()}ê±´</span>
              <span className="error-percentage">
                {((count / totalRequests) * 100).toFixed(1)}%
              </span>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default ErrorChart;
```

TypeScript ì—ëŸ¬ë¥¼ ìˆ˜ì •í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React from 'react';
import {
  PieChart,
  Pie,
  Cell,
  ResponsiveContainer,
  Tooltip,
  Legend
} from 'recharts';
import { ErrorData } from '../services/api';

interface ErrorChartProps {
  data: ErrorData;
}

const ErrorChart: React.FC<ErrorChartProps> = ({ data }) => {
  // ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ë¡œë”© ë©”ì‹œì§€ í‘œì‹œ
  if (!data || Object.keys(data).length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="chart-container">
        <div className="no-data">ì—ëŸ¬ ë¶„í¬ ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // ì°¨íŠ¸ ë°ì´í„° í¬ë§·íŒ…
  const chartData = Object.entries(data).map(([key, value]) => ({
    name: key,
    value: value,
    color: getStatusColor(key)
  }));

  // ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œë³„ ìƒ‰ìƒ ì •ì˜
  function getStatusColor(status: string): string {
    switch (status) {
      case '200xx':
        return '#52c41a'; // ì„±ê³µ - ì´ˆë¡ìƒ‰
      case '300xx':
        return '#1890ff'; // ë¦¬ë‹¤ì´ë ‰íŠ¸ - íŒŒë€ìƒ‰
      case '400xx':
        return '#faad14'; // í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ì—ëŸ¬ - ì£¼í™©ìƒ‰
      case '500xx':
        return '#f5222d'; // ì„œë²„ ì—ëŸ¬ - ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
      default:
        return '#d9d9d9'; // ê¸°íƒ€ - íšŒìƒ‰
    }
  }

  // ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œë³„ ì„¤ëª…
  function getStatusDescription(status: string): string {
    switch (status) {
      case '200xx':
        return 'ì„±ê³µ (2xx)';
      case '300xx':
        return 'ë¦¬ë‹¤ì´ë ‰íŠ¸ (3xx)';
      case '400xx':
        return 'í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ì—ëŸ¬ (4xx)';
      case '500xx':
        return 'ì„œë²„ ì—ëŸ¬ (5xx)';
      default:
        return status;
    }
  }

  // ì´ ìš”ì²­ ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚°
  const totalRequests = Object.values(data).reduce((sum, count) => sum + count, 0);

  // ì„±ê³µë¥  ê³„ì‚°
  const successRate = data['200xx'] ? ((data['200xx'] / totalRequests) * 100).toFixed(1) : '0.0';

  // ì—ëŸ¬ìœ¨ ê³„ì‚°
  const errorRate = data['400xx'] || data['500xx'] 
    ? (((data['400xx'] || 0) + (data['500xx'] || 0)) / totalRequests * 100).toFixed(1) 
    : '0.0';

  return (
    <div className="chart-container">
      <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
        <PieChart>
          <Pie
            data={chartData}
            cx="50%"
            cy="50%"
            labelLine={false}
            label={({ name, percent }) => `${getStatusDescription(name)} ${percent ? (percent * 100).toFixed(0) : 0}%`}
            outerRadius={80}
            fill="#8884d8"
            dataKey="value"
          >
            {chartData.map((entry, index) => (
              <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={entry.color} />
            ))}
          </Pie>
          <Tooltip 
            formatter={(value: number) => [`${value}ê±´`, 'ìš”ì²­ ìˆ˜']}
            labelFormatter={(label) => getStatusDescription(label)}
          />
          <Legend 
            formatter={(value) => getStatusDescription(value)}
            layout="horizontal"
            verticalAlign="bottom"
            align="center"
          />
        </PieChart>
      </ResponsiveContainer>
      
      {/* ìš”ì•½ í†µê³„ */}
      <div className="chart-summary">
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì´ ìš”ì²­:</span>
          <span className="value">{totalRequests.toLocaleString()}ê±´</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì„±ê³µë¥ :</span>
          <span className="value success">{successRate}%</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì—ëŸ¬ìœ¨:</span>
          <span className="value error">{errorRate}%</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ê°€ì¥ ë§ì€ ì—ëŸ¬:</span>
          <span className="value">
            {Object.entries(data)
              .filter(([key]) => key !== '200xx')
              .sort(([,a], [,b]) => b - a)[0]?.[0] || '-'}
          </span>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* ìƒì„¸ í†µê³„ í…Œì´ë¸” */}
      <div className="error-details">
        <h4>ìƒì„¸ í†µê³„</h4>
        <div className="error-table">
          {Object.entries(data).map(([status, count]) => (
            <div key={status} className="error-row">
              <span className="error-status">{getStatusDescription(status)}</span>
              <span className="error-count">{count.toLocaleString()}ê±´</span>
              <span className="error-percentage">
                {((count / totalRequests) * 100).toFixed(1)}%
              </span>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default ErrorChart;
```

ì´ì œ Dashboard ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì—ì„œ ì„ì‹œ ErrorChartë¥¼ ì‹¤ì œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¡œ êµì²´í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { dashboardApi, TrafficData, UsageData, ErrorData, BottleneckData } from '../services/api';
import TrafficChart from './TrafficChart';
import UsageChart from './UsageChart';
import ErrorChart from './ErrorChart';
import './Dashboard.css';

const Dashboard: React.FC = () => {
  const [trafficData, setTrafficData] = useState<TrafficData[]>([]);
  const [usageData, setUsageData] = useState<UsageData[]>([]);
  const [errorData, setErrorData] = useState<ErrorData>({});
  const [bottleneckData, setBottleneckData] = useState<BottleneckData[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);

  // ê¸°ë³¸ ë‚ ì§œ ë²”ìœ„ (ìµœê·¼ 3ì¼)
  const getDefaultDateRange = () => {
    const end = new Date();
    const start = new Date();
    start.setDate(start.getDate() - 3);
    return {
      start: start.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T00:00:00',
      end: end.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T23:59:59'
    };
  };

  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState(getDefaultDateRange());

  const fetchDashboardData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setError(null);

      const { start, end } = dateRange;

      const [traffic, usage, errors, bottlenecks] = await Promise.all([
        dashboardApi.getTraffic(start, end, 5),
        dashboardApi.getUsage(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getErrors(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getBottlenecks(start, end, 5)
      ]);

      setTrafficData(traffic);
      setUsageData(usage);
      setErrorData(errors);
      setBottleneckData(bottlenecks);
    } catch (err) {
      setError('ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
      console.error('Dashboard data fetch error:', err);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchDashboardData();
  }, [dateRange]);

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="loading">ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="error">{error}</div>
        <button onClick={fetchDashboardData}>ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‹œë„</button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="dashboard">
      <header className="dashboard-header">
        <h1>ë¡œê·¸ ë¶„ì„ ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ</h1>
        <div className="date-range">
          <label>
            ì‹œì‘ì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.start}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, start: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
          <label>
            ì¢…ë£Œì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.end}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, end: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
        </div>
      </header>

      <div className="dashboard-grid">
        {/* íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„</h2>
          <TrafficChart data={trafficData} />
        </div>

        {/* ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™©</h2>
          <UsageChart data={usageData} />
        </div>

        {/* ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬</h2>
          <ErrorChart data={errorData} />
        </div>

        {/* ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„</h2>
          <div className="chart-container">
            <BottleneckChart data={bottleneckData} />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

// ì„ì‹œ ì°¨íŠ¸ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)
const BottleneckChart: React.FC<{ data: BottleneckData[] }> = ({ data }) => (
  <div className="placeholder-chart">
    <p>ë³‘ëª© ë¶„ì„ ì°¨íŠ¸ (ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ êµ¬í˜„)</p>
    <pre>{JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}</pre>
  </div>
);

export default Dashboard;
```

## 4ë‹¨ê³„ ì™„ë£Œ! ğŸ‰

## ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„:

**Cursor**

ì¢‹ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤! **5ë‹¨ê³„: ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ (Table + Chart)**ë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React from 'react';
import {
  BarChart,
  Bar,
  XAxis,
  YAxis,
  CartesianGrid,
  Tooltip,
  ResponsiveContainer,
  Legend,
  ComposedChart,
  Line
} from 'recharts';
import { BottleneckData } from '../services/api';

interface BottleneckChartProps {
  data: BottleneckData[];
}

const BottleneckChart: React.FC<BottleneckChartProps> = ({ data }) => {
  // ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ë¡œë”© ë©”ì‹œì§€ í‘œì‹œ
  if (!data || data.length === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="chart-container">
        <div className="no-data">ë³‘ëª© ë¶„ì„ ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // API ê²½ë¡œë¥¼ ì§§ê²Œ í‘œì‹œí•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜
  const formatPath = (path: string) => {
    if (path.length > 25) {
      return path.substring(0, 25) + '...';
    }
    return path;
  };

  // ì°¨íŠ¸ ë°ì´í„° í¬ë§·íŒ…
  const chartData = data.map(item => ({
    ...item,
    shortPath: formatPath(item.path),
    fullPath: item.path,
    avgMs: Math.round(item.avg_ms),
    p90Ms: Math.round(item.p90_ms)
  }));

  // ì„±ëŠ¥ ë“±ê¸‰ ê³„ì‚°
  const getPerformanceGrade = (avgMs: number): { grade: string; color: string; description: string } => {
    if (avgMs < 100) return { grade: 'A', color: '#52c41a', description: 'ìš°ìˆ˜' };
    if (avgMs < 200) return { grade: 'B', color: '#1890ff', description: 'ì–‘í˜¸' };
    if (avgMs < 500) return { grade: 'C', color: '#faad14', description: 'ë³´í†µ' };
    if (avgMs < 1000) return { grade: 'D', color: '#fa8c16', description: 'ëŠë¦¼' };
    return { grade: 'F', color: '#f5222d', description: 'ë§¤ìš° ëŠë¦¼' };
  };

  // ì´ í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
  const totalAvgMs = data.length > 0 
    ? Math.round(data.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.avg_ms, 0) / data.length)
    : 0;

  // ê°€ì¥ ëŠë¦° API ì°¾ê¸°
  const slowestApi = data.length > 0 
    ? data.reduce((max, item) => item.avg_ms > max.avg_ms ? item : max)
    : null;

  return (
    <div className="chart-container">
      <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
        <ComposedChart data={chartData} margin={{ top: 5, right: 30, left: 20, bottom: 80 }}>
          <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
          <XAxis 
            dataKey="shortPath" 
            angle={-45}
            textAnchor="end"
            height={80}
            interval={0}
            tick={{ fontSize: 11 }}
          />
          <YAxis 
            yAxisId="left"
            label={{ value: 'ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„ (ms)', angle: -90, position: 'insideLeft' }}
            tick={{ fontSize: 12 }}
          />
          <Tooltip 
            formatter={(value: number, name: string) => {
              if (name === 'avgMs') return [`${value}ms`, 'í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„'];
              if (name === 'p90Ms') return [`${value}ms`, 'P90 ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„'];
              return [value, name];
            }}
            labelFormatter={(label, payload) => {
              if (payload && payload[0]) {
                return `API: ${payload[0].payload.fullPath}`;
              }
              return label;
            }}
          />
          <Legend />
          <Bar 
            yAxisId="left"
            dataKey="avgMs" 
            fill="#8884d8" 
            name="í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„"
            radius={[4, 4, 0, 0]}
          />
          <Line 
            yAxisId="left"
            type="monotone" 
            dataKey="p90Ms" 
            stroke="#ff7300" 
            strokeWidth={2}
            dot={{ fill: '#ff7300', strokeWidth: 2, r: 4 }}
            activeDot={{ r: 6 }}
            name="P90 ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„"
          />
        </ComposedChart>
      </ResponsiveContainer>
      
      {/* ìš”ì•½ í†µê³„ */}
      <div className="chart-summary">
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ì „ì²´ í‰ê· :</span>
          <span className="value">{totalAvgMs}ms</span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ê°€ì¥ ëŠë¦° API:</span>
          <span className="value">
            {slowestApi ? formatPath(slowestApi.path) : '-'}
          </span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ìµœê³  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„:</span>
          <span className="value error">
            {slowestApi ? Math.round(slowestApi.avg_ms) : 0}ms
          </span>
        </div>
        <div className="summary-item">
          <span className="label">ë¶„ì„ ëŒ€ìƒ:</span>
          <span className="value">{data.length}ê°œ API</span>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* ìƒì„¸ ì„±ëŠ¥ í…Œì´ë¸” */}
      <div className="bottleneck-details">
        <h4>ìƒì„¸ ì„±ëŠ¥ ë¶„ì„</h4>
        <div className="bottleneck-table">
          <div className="table-header">
            <span className="header-path">API ê²½ë¡œ</span>
            <span className="header-avg">í‰ê·  (ms)</span>
            <span className="header-p90">P90 (ms)</span>
            <span className="header-grade">ë“±ê¸‰</span>
            <span className="header-status">ìƒíƒœ</span>
          </div>
          {data.map((item, index) => {
            const grade = getPerformanceGrade(item.avg_ms);
            return (
              <div key={index} className="table-row">
                <span className="row-path" title={item.path}>
                  {formatPath(item.path)}
                </span>
                <span className="row-avg">{Math.round(item.avg_ms)}ms</span>
                <span className="row-p90">{Math.round(item.p90_ms)}ms</span>
                <span className="row-grade" style={{ color: grade.color }}>
                  {grade.grade}
                </span>
                <span className="row-status" style={{ color: grade.color }}>
                  {grade.description}
                </span>
              </div>
            );
          })}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* ì„±ëŠ¥ ê°œì„  ì œì•ˆ */}
      <div className="performance-suggestions">
        <h4>ì„±ëŠ¥ ê°œì„  ì œì•ˆ</h4>
        <div className="suggestions-list">
          {data.filter(item => item.avg_ms > 200).map((item, index) => (
            <div key={index} className="suggestion-item">
              <span className="suggestion-api">{formatPath(item.path)}</span>
              <span className="suggestion-reason">
                í‰ê·  {Math.round(item.avg_ms)}msë¡œ ëŠë¦¼ - ìºì‹± ë˜ëŠ” DB ìµœì í™” ê¶Œì¥
              </span>
            </div>
          ))}
          {data.filter(item => item.avg_ms > 200).length === 0 && (
            <div className="suggestion-item good">
              <span className="suggestion-reason">ëª¨ë“  APIê°€ ì–‘í˜¸í•œ ì„±ëŠ¥ì„ ë³´ì´ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤! ğŸ‰</span>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default BottleneckChart;
```

ì´ì œ Dashboard ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ì—ì„œ ì„ì‹œ BottleneckChartë¥¼ ì‹¤ì œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¡œ êµì²´í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { dashboardApi, TrafficData, UsageData, ErrorData, BottleneckData } from '../services/api';
import TrafficChart from './TrafficChart';
import UsageChart from './UsageChart';
import ErrorChart from './ErrorChart';
import BottleneckChart from './BottleneckChart';
import './Dashboard.css';

const Dashboard: React.FC = () => {
  const [trafficData, setTrafficData] = useState<TrafficData[]>([]);
  const [usageData, setUsageData] = useState<UsageData[]>([]);
  const [errorData, setErrorData] = useState<ErrorData>({});
  const [bottleneckData, setBottleneckData] = useState<BottleneckData[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);

  // ê¸°ë³¸ ë‚ ì§œ ë²”ìœ„ (ìµœê·¼ 3ì¼)
  const getDefaultDateRange = () => {
    const end = new Date();
    const start = new Date();
    start.setDate(start.getDate() - 3);
    return {
      start: start.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T00:00:00',
      end: end.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T23:59:59'
    };
  };

  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState(getDefaultDateRange());

  const fetchDashboardData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setError(null);

      const { start, end } = dateRange;

      const [traffic, usage, errors, bottlenecks] = await Promise.all([
        dashboardApi.getTraffic(start, end, 5),
        dashboardApi.getUsage(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getErrors(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getBottlenecks(start, end, 5)
      ]);

      setTrafficData(traffic);
      setUsageData(usage);
      setErrorData(errors);
      setBottleneckData(bottlenecks);
    } catch (err) {
      setError('ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
      console.error('Dashboard data fetch error:', err);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchDashboardData();
  }, [dateRange]);

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="loading">ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="error">{error}</div>
        <button onClick={fetchDashboardData}>ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‹œë„</button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="dashboard">
      <header className="dashboard-header">
        <h1>ë¡œê·¸ ë¶„ì„ ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ</h1>
        <div className="date-range">
          <label>
            ì‹œì‘ì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.start}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, start: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
          <label>
            ì¢…ë£Œì¼:
            <input
              type="datetime-local"
              value={dateRange.end}
              onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, end: e.target.value }))}
            />
          </label>
        </div>
      </header>

      <div className="dashboard-grid">
        {/* íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„</h2>
          <TrafficChart data={trafficData} />
        </div>

        {/* ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™©</h2>
          <UsageChart data={usageData} />
        </div>

        {/* ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬</h2>
          <ErrorChart data={errorData} />
        </div>

        {/* ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„</h2>
          <BottleneckChart data={bottleneckData} />
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default Dashboard;
```

## 5ë‹¨ê³„ ì™„ë£Œ! ï¿½ï¿½

**ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ (Table + Chart)**ì´ êµ¬í˜„ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!

### êµ¬í˜„ëœ ê¸°ëŠ¥:
âœ… **ë³µí•© ì°¨íŠ¸**: ë°” ì°¨íŠ¸(í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„) + ë¼ì¸ ì°¨íŠ¸(P90 ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„)  
âœ… **ì„±ëŠ¥ ë“±ê¸‰ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ**: A(ìš°ìˆ˜) ~ F(ë§¤ìš° ëŠë¦¼) ë“±ê¸‰ ë¶„ë¥˜  
âœ… **ìƒì„¸ ì„±ëŠ¥ í…Œì´ë¸”**: APIë³„ í‰ê· , P90, ë“±ê¸‰, ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ  
âœ… **ìë™ ê°œì„  ì œì•ˆ**: ëŠë¦° APIì— ëŒ€í•œ êµ¬ì²´ì ì¸ ê°œì„  ë°©ì•ˆ ì œì‹œ  
âœ… **ìš”ì•½ í†µê³„**: ì „ì²´ í‰ê· , ê°€ì¥ ëŠë¦° API, ìµœê³  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„  
âœ… **ìƒ‰ìƒ ì½”ë”©**: ë“±ê¸‰ë³„ ìƒ‰ìƒìœ¼ë¡œ ì§ê´€ì  í‘œí˜„  
âœ… **ë°˜ì‘í˜• í…Œì´ë¸”**: ëª¨ë°”ì¼ì—ì„œë„ ê¹”ë”í•˜ê²Œ í‘œì‹œ  

### ì°¨íŠ¸ íŠ¹ì§•:
- **íŒŒë€ìƒ‰ ë°”**: ê° APIì˜ í‰ê·  ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„
- **ì£¼í™©ìƒ‰ ë¼ì¸**: ê° APIì˜ P90 ì‘ë‹µì‹œê°„ (90% ìš”ì²­ì´ ì´ ì‹œê°„ ë‚´ì— ì™„ë£Œ)
- **ì„±ëŠ¥ ë“±ê¸‰**: A(100ms ë¯¸ë§Œ) ~ F(1000ms ì´ìƒ)
- **ê°œì„  ì œì•ˆ**: 200ms ì´ìƒì¸ APIì— ëŒ€í•´ ìºì‹±/DB ìµœì í™” ê¶Œì¥

ì´ì œ ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ í™•ì¸í•˜ì‹œë©´ ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ë¶„ì„ì´ ì™„ì „íˆ êµ¬í˜„ëœ ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œë¥¼ ë³´ì‹¤ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!

## ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ê³„:
**6ë‹¨ê³„: ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ ë° ì¶”ê°€ ê¸°ëŠ¥**ì„ êµ¬í˜„í• ê¹Œìš”?

ì´ ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œëŠ” WebSocket ì—°ë™, ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨, ì¶”ê°€ í•„í„°ë§ ê¸°ëŠ¥ ë“±ì„ êµ¬í˜„í•  ì˜ˆì •ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

---

**User**

ì‘

---

**Cursor**

ì¢‹ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤! **6ë‹¨ê³„: ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ ë° ì¶”ê°€ ê¸°ëŠ¥**ì„ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

ë¨¼ì € WebSocket ì—°ë™ê³¼ ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescript
export interface LogEvent {
  timestamp: string;
  method: string;
  path: string;
  status: number;
  latency_ms: number;
  client_ip: string;
}

class WebSocketService {
  private ws: WebSocket | null = null;
  private reconnectAttempts = 0;
  private maxReconnectAttempts = 5;
  private reconnectInterval = 3000; // 3ì´ˆ
  private onLogCallback: ((log: LogEvent) => void) | null = null;
  private onConnectCallback: (() => void) | null = null;
  private onDisconnectCallback: (() => void) | null = null;

  connect(url: string = 'ws://localhost:8000/api/stats/logs/ws') {
    try {
      this.ws = new WebSocket(url);
      
      this.ws.onopen = () => {
        console.log('WebSocket ì—°ê²°ë¨');
        this.reconnectAttempts = 0;
        if (this.onConnectCallback) {
          this.onConnectCallback();
        }
      };

      this.ws.onmessage = (event) => {
        try {
          const logData: LogEvent = JSON.parse(event.data);
          if (this.onLogCallback) {
            this.onLogCallback(logData);
          }
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('WebSocket ë©”ì‹œì§€ íŒŒì‹± ì˜¤ë¥˜:', error);
        }
      };

      this.ws.onclose = () => {
        console.log('WebSocket ì—°ê²° ëŠì–´ì§');
        if (this.onDisconnectCallback) {
          this.onDisconnectCallback();
        }
        this.attemptReconnect();
      };

      this.ws.onerror = (error) => {
        console.error('WebSocket ì˜¤ë¥˜:', error);
      };

    } catch (error) {
      console.error('WebSocket ì—°ê²° ì‹¤íŒ¨:', error);
      this.attemptReconnect();
    }
  }

  private attemptReconnect() {
    if (this.reconnectAttempts < this.maxReconnectAttempts) {
      this.reconnectAttempts++;
      console.log(`WebSocket ì¬ì—°ê²° ì‹œë„ ${this.reconnectAttempts}/${this.maxReconnectAttempts}`);
      
      setTimeout(() => {
        this.connect();
      }, this.reconnectInterval);
    } else {
      console.error('WebSocket ìµœëŒ€ ì¬ì—°ê²° ì‹œë„ íšŸìˆ˜ ì´ˆê³¼');
    }
  }

  disconnect() {
    if (this.ws) {
      this.ws.close();
      this.ws = null;
    }
  }

  sendPing() {
    if (this.ws && this.ws.readyState === WebSocket.OPEN) {
      this.ws.send('ping');
    }
  }

  onLog(callback: (log: LogEvent) => void) {
    this.onLogCallback = callback;
  }

  onConnect(callback: () => void) {
    this.onConnectCallback = callback;
  }

  onDisconnect(callback: () => void) {
    this.onDisconnectCallback = callback;
  }

  isConnected(): boolean {
    return this.ws?.readyState === WebSocket.OPEN;
  }
}

export const websocketService = new WebSocketService();
```

ì´ì œ ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¡œê·¸ í‘œì‹œ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { websocketService, LogEvent } from '../services/websocket';
import './RealTimeLogs.css';

const RealTimeLogs: React.FC = () => {
  const [logs, setLogs] = useState<LogEvent[]>([]);
  const [isConnected, setIsConnected] = useState(false);
  const [autoRefresh, setAutoRefresh] = useState(true);
  const [maxLogs, setMaxLogs] = useState(50);

  useEffect(() => {
    // WebSocket ì—°ê²°
    websocketService.connect();

    // ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ í•¸ë“¤ëŸ¬ ë“±ë¡
    websocketService.onConnect(() => {
      setIsConnected(true);
    });

    websocketService.onDisconnect(() => {
      setIsConnected(false);
    });

    websocketService.onLog((log: LogEvent) => {
      setLogs(prevLogs => {
        const newLogs = [log, ...prevLogs];
        return newLogs.slice(0, maxLogs);
      });
    });

    // ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ ì–¸ë§ˆìš´íŠ¸ ì‹œ ì—°ê²° í•´ì œ
    return () => {
      websocketService.disconnect();
    };
  }, [maxLogs]);

  // ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (30ì´ˆë§ˆë‹¤ ping)
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!autoRefresh) return;

    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      if (isConnected) {
        websocketService.sendPing();
      }
    }, 30000);

    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [autoRefresh, isConnected]);

  const clearLogs = () => {
    setLogs([]);
  };

  const getStatusColor = (status: number): string => {
    if (status >= 200 && status < 300) return '#52c41a';
    if (status >= 300 && status < 400) return '#1890ff';
    if (status >= 400 && status < 500) return '#faad14';
    return '#f5222d';
  };

  const getMethodColor = (method: string): string => {
    switch (method.toUpperCase()) {
      case 'GET': return '#52c41a';
      case 'POST': return '#1890ff';
      case 'PUT': return '#faad14';
      case 'DELETE': return '#f5222d';
      default: return '#666';
    }
  };

  const formatTime = (timestamp: string) => {
    return new Date(timestamp).toLocaleTimeString('ko-KR', {
      hour: '2-digit',
      minute: '2-digit',
      second: '2-digit'
    });
  };

  return (
    <div className="realtime-logs">
      <div className="logs-header">
        <h3>ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¡œê·¸</h3>
        <div className="logs-controls">
          <div className="connection-status">
            <span className={`status-dot ${isConnected ? 'connected' : 'disconnected'}`}></span>
            <span className="status-text">
              {isConnected ? 'ì—°ê²°ë¨' : 'ì—°ê²° ëŠì–´ì§'}
            </span>
          </div>
          <label className="auto-refresh-toggle">
            <input
              type="checkbox"
              checked={autoRefresh}
              onChange={(e) => setAutoRefresh(e.target.checked)}
            />
            ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨
          </label>
          <select
            value={maxLogs}
            onChange={(e) => setMaxLogs(Number(e.target.value))}
            className="max-logs-select"
          >
            <option value={20}>ìµœê·¼ 20ê°œ</option>
            <option value={50}>ìµœê·¼ 50ê°œ</option>
            <option value={100}>ìµœê·¼ 100ê°œ</option>
          </select>
          <button onClick={clearLogs} className="clear-logs-btn">
            ë¡œê·¸ ì§€ìš°ê¸°
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="logs-container">
        {logs.length === 0 ? (
          <div className="no-logs">
            {isConnected ? 'ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¡œê·¸ë¥¼ ê¸°ë‹¤ë¦¬ëŠ” ì¤‘...' : 'WebSocket ì—°ê²°ì„ ê¸°ë‹¤ë¦¬ëŠ” ì¤‘...'}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="logs-list">
            {logs.map((log, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="log-item">
                <div className="log-time">{formatTime(log.timestamp)}</div>
                <div 
                  className="log-method"
                  style={{ backgroundColor: getMethodColor(log.method) }}
                >
                  {log.method}
                </div>
                <div className="log-path">{log.path}</div>
                <div 
                  className="log-status"
                  style={{ color: getStatusColor(log.status) }}
                >
                  {log.status}
                </div>
                <div className="log-latency">{log.latency_ms}ms</div>
                <div className="log-ip">{log.client_ip}</div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>

      <div className="logs-footer">
        <span>ì´ {logs.length}ê°œ ë¡œê·¸</span>
        {isConnected && (
          <span className="live-indicator">â— ì‹¤ì‹œê°„</span>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default RealTimeLogs;
```

ì´ì œ Dashboardì— ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¡œê·¸ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê³  ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.


```typescriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react';
import { dashboardApi, TrafficData, UsageData, ErrorData, BottleneckData } from '../services/api';
import TrafficChart from './TrafficChart';
import UsageChart from './UsageChart';
import ErrorChart from './ErrorChart';
import BottleneckChart from './BottleneckChart';
import RealTimeLogs from './RealTimeLogs';
import './Dashboard.css';

const Dashboard: React.FC = () => {
  const [trafficData, setTrafficData] = useState<TrafficData[]>([]);
  const [usageData, setUsageData] = useState<UsageData[]>([]);
  const [errorData, setErrorData] = useState<ErrorData>({});
  const [bottleneckData, setBottleneckData] = useState<BottleneckData[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [autoRefresh, setAutoRefresh] = useState(false);
  const [refreshInterval, setRefreshInterval] = useState(30); // 30ì´ˆ

  // ê¸°ë³¸ ë‚ ì§œ ë²”ìœ„ (ìµœê·¼ 3ì¼)
  const getDefaultDateRange = () => {
    const end = new Date();
    const start = new Date();
    start.setDate(start.getDate() - 3);
    return {
      start: start.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T00:00:00',
      end: end.toISOString().split('T')[0] + 'T23:59:59'
    };
  };

  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState(getDefaultDateRange());

  const fetchDashboardData = useCallback(async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setError(null);

      const { start, end } = dateRange;

      const [traffic, usage, errors, bottlenecks] = await Promise.all([
        dashboardApi.getTraffic(start, end, 5),
        dashboardApi.getUsage(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getErrors(start, end),
        dashboardApi.getBottlenecks(start, end, 5)
      ]);

      setTrafficData(traffic);
      setUsageData(usage);
      setErrorData(errors);
      setBottleneckData(bottlenecks);
    } catch (err) {
      setError('ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.');
      console.error('Dashboard data fetch error:', err);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  }, [dateRange]);

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchDashboardData();
  }, [fetchDashboardData]);

  // ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!autoRefresh) return;

    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      fetchDashboardData();
    }, refreshInterval * 1000);

    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [autoRefresh, refreshInterval, fetchDashboardData]);

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="loading">ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ëŠ” ì¤‘...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      <div className="dashboard">
        <div className="error">{error}</div>
        <button onClick={fetchDashboardData}>ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‹œë„</button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="dashboard">
      <header className="dashboard-header">
        <h1>ë¡œê·¸ ë¶„ì„ ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œ</h1>
        <div className="dashboard-controls">
          <div className="date-range">
            <label>
              ì‹œì‘ì¼:
              <input
                type="datetime-local"
                value={dateRange.start}
                onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, start: e.target.value }))}
              />
            </label>
            <label>
              ì¢…ë£Œì¼:
              <input
                type="datetime-local"
                value={dateRange.end}
                onChange={(e) => setDateRange(prev => ({ ...prev, end: e.target.value }))}
              />
            </label>
          </div>
          <div className="refresh-controls">
            <label className="auto-refresh-toggle">
              <input
                type="checkbox"
                checked={autoRefresh}
                onChange={(e) => setAutoRefresh(e.target.checked)}
              />
              ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨
            </label>
            {autoRefresh && (
              <select
                value={refreshInterval}
                onChange={(e) => setRefreshInterval(Number(e.target.value))}
                className="refresh-interval-select"
              >
                <option value={10}>10ì´ˆ</option>
                <option value={30}>30ì´ˆ</option>
                <option value={60}>1ë¶„</option>
                <option value={300}>5ë¶„</option>
              </select>
            )}
            <button onClick={fetchDashboardData} className="manual-refresh-btn">
              ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </header>

      <div className="dashboard-grid">
        {/* íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>íŠ¸ë˜í”½ ë¶„í¬ ë¶„ì„</h2>
          <TrafficChart data={trafficData} />
        </div>

        {/* ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™© */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì—”ë“œí¬ì¸íŠ¸ë³„ ì‚¬ìš© í˜„í™©</h2>
          <UsageChart data={usageData} />
        </div>

        {/* ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ìƒíƒœ ì½”ë“œ ë¶„í¬</h2>
          <ErrorChart data={errorData} />
        </div>

        {/* ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„ */}
        <div className="dashboard-card">
          <h2>ì„±ëŠ¥ ë³‘ëª© ì‹ë³„</h2>
          <BottleneckChart data={bottleneckData} />
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¡œê·¸ */}
      <div className="realtime-section">
        <RealTimeLogs />
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default Dashboard;
```

ì´ì œ Dashboard CSSì— ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ê³¼ ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ì„¹ì…˜ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ì„ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

```css
  background: white;

.manual-refresh-btn {
  padding: 8px 16px;
  background: #007bff;
  color: white;
```

3. **Network íƒ­ì—ì„œ WebSocket ì—°ê²° ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸**

ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ì„ì‹œë¡œ ë” ê°„ë‹¨í•œ ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¡œê·¸ í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ë¥¼ í•´ë³´ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:


```typescriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { websocketService, LogEvent } from '../services/websocket';
import './RealTimeLogs.css';

const RealTimeLogs: React.FC = () => {
  const [logs, setLogs] = useState<LogEvent[]>([]);
  const [isConnected, setIsConnected] = useState(false);
  const [autoRefresh, setAutoRefresh] = useState(true);
  const [maxLogs, setMaxLogs] = useState(50);
  const [connectionStatus, setConnectionStatus] = useState('ì—°ê²° ì‹œë„ ì¤‘...');

  useEffect(() => {
    console.log('RealTimeLogs: WebSocket ì—°ê²° ì‹œë„');
    
    // WebSocket ì—°ê²°
    websocketService.connect();

    // ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ í•¸ë“¤ëŸ¬ ë“±ë¡
    websocketService.onConnect(() => {
      console.log('RealTimeLogs: WebSocket ì—°ê²°ë¨');
      setIsConnected(true);
      setConnectionStatus('ì—°ê²°ë¨');
    });

    websocketService.onDisconnect(() => {
      console.log('RealTimeLogs: WebSocket ì—°ê²° ëŠì–´ì§');
      setIsConnected(false);
      setConnectionStatus('ì—°ê²° ëŠì–´ì§');
    });

    websocketService.onLog((log: LogEvent) => {
      console.log('RealTimeLogs: ìƒˆ ë¡œê·¸ ìˆ˜ì‹ :', log);
      setLogs(prevLogs => {
        const newLogs = [log, ...prevLogs];
        return newLogs.slice(0, maxLogs);
      });
    });

    // ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ ì–¸ë§ˆìš´íŠ¸ ì‹œ ì—°ê²° í•´ì œ
    return () => {
      console.log('RealTimeLogs: WebSocket ì—°ê²° í•´ì œ');
      websocketService.disconnect();
    };
  }, [maxLogs]);

  // ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (30ì´ˆë§ˆë‹¤ ping)
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!autoRefresh) return;

    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      if (isConnected) {
        console.log('RealTimeLogs: ping ì „ì†¡');
        websocketService.sendPing();
      }
    }, 30000);

    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [autoRefresh, isConnected]);

  const clearLogs = () => {
    setLogs([]);
  };

  const testConnection = () => {
    console.log('RealTimeLogs: ìˆ˜ë™ ping ì „ì†¡');
    websocketService.sendPing();
  };

  const getStatusColor = (status: number): string => {
    if (status >= 200 && status < 300) return '#52c41a';
    if (status >= 300 && status < 400) return '#1890ff';
    if (status >= 400 && status < 500) return '#faad14';
    return '#f5222d';
  };

  const getMethodColor = (method: string): string => {
    switch (method.toUpperCase()) {
      case 'GET': return '#52c41a';
      case 'POST': return '#1890ff';
      case 'PUT': return '#faad14';
      case 'DELETE': return '#f5222d';
      default: return '#666';
    }
  };

  const formatTime = (timestamp: string) => {
    return new Date(timestamp).toLocaleTimeString('ko-KR', {
      hour: '2-digit',
      minute: '2-digit',
      second: '2-digit'
    });
  };

  return (
    <div className="realtime-logs">
      <div className="logs-header">
        <h3>ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¡œê·¸</h3>
        <div className="logs-controls">
          <div className="connection-status">
            <span className={`status-dot ${isConnected ? 'connected' : 'disconnected'}`}></span>
            <span className="status-text">
              {connectionStatus}
            </span>
          </div>
          <button onClick={testConnection} className="test-connection-btn">
            ì—°ê²° í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸
          </button>
          <label className="auto-refresh-toggle">
            <input
              type="checkbox"
              checked={autoRefresh}
              onChange={(e) => setAutoRefresh(e.target.checked)}
            />
            ìë™ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨
          </label>
          <select
            value={maxLogs}
            onChange={(e) => setMaxLogs(Number(e.target.value))}
            className="max-logs-select"
          >
            <option value={20}>ìµœê·¼ 20ê°œ</option>
            <option value={50}>ìµœê·¼ 50ê°œ</option>
            <option value={100}>ìµœê·¼ 100ê°œ</option>
          </select>
          <button onClick={clearLogs} className="clear-logs-btn">
            ë¡œê·¸ ì§€ìš°ê¸°
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="logs-container">
        {logs.length === 0 ? (
          <div className="no-logs">
            {isConnected ? 'ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¡œê·¸ë¥¼ ê¸°ë‹¤ë¦¬ëŠ” ì¤‘... (pingì„ ë³´ë‚´ë©´ ìµœì‹  ë¡œê·¸ê°€ í‘œì‹œë©ë‹ˆë‹¤)' : 'WebSocket ì—°ê²°ì„ ê¸°ë‹¤ë¦¬ëŠ” ì¤‘...'}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="logs-list">
            {logs.map((log, index) => (
              <div key={index} className="log-item">
                <div className="log-time">{formatTime(log.timestamp)}</div>
                <div 
                  className="log-method"
                  style={{ backgroundColor: getMethodColor(log.method) }}
                >
                  {log.method}
                </div>
                <div className="log-path">{log.path}</div>
                <div 
                  className="log-status"
                  style={{ color: getStatusColor(log.status) }}
                >
                  {log.status}
                </div>
                <div className="log-latency">{log.latency_ms}ms</div>
                <div className="log-ip">{log.client_ip}</div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>

      <div className="logs-footer">
        <span>ì´ {logs.length}ê°œ ë¡œê·¸</span>
        {isConnected && (
          <span className="live-indicator">â— ì‹¤ì‹œê°„</span>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default RealTimeLogs;
```
